name: Viva Pinata: Pocket Paradise
description:
Viva Piñata, one of the most acclaimed original family video game
franchises ever,

finally arrives on the Nintendo DS. Based on the hit TV series, Viva
Piñata: Pocket Paradise allows players to turn a neglected garden into a
lush paradise that will attract a wide variety of colorful piñatas.
Build piñata homes, plant and maintain vegetation,

feed and breed piñatas, decorate the garden and much more. With the
swipe of a

stylus and their own creativity, players can create the ultimate piñata
paradise
